snippet.title: Infernax Deux or Die Update Coming April 5th: Extended Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
💀Buy Infernax on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/37...
💀Buy Infernax on Nintendo Switch Europe: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nint...
💀 Buy Infernax on Nintendo Switch America: https://www.nintendo.com/store/produc...
💀 Buy Infernax on Playstation 4 Europe: https://store.playstation.com/fr-fr/c...
💀 Buy Infernax on Playstation 4 America: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/c...
💀 Buy Infernax on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/stor...

It's dangerous to go alone, that's why there's two of you now!

On April 5th,  relive the adventures of Alcedor, now joined by Cervul, his trusty squire, and forge the future of the kingdom of Upel together with a friend, or alone in hotswap mode.

Available on all platforms that the game is currently available on as a free update, which is pretty much everything. 

© The Arcade Crew - Berzerk Studio - 2023 All Rights Reserved
